abstract: In August, a Chinese antimonopoly law takes effect that will extend the nation’s economic influence far beyond its borders.
snippet: In August, a Chinese antimonopoly law takes effect that will extend the nation’s economic influence far beyond its borders.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO  Microsoft’s hostile-takeover attempt against Yahoo may encounter an unexpected hurdle in August after a Chinese antimonopoly law takes effect that will extend the nation’s economic influence far beyond its borders.

headline.main: China Law Could Impede Microsoft Deal for Yahoo
headline.print_headline: China Law Could Impede Microsoft Deal for Yahoo
